tools.name: create_note
tools.description: Create a personal note for observations, findings, and research during the scan.
tools.details:
Use this tool for documenting discoveries, observations, methodology notes, and questions.
This is your personal notepad for recording information you want to remember or reference later.
For tracking actionable tasks, use the todo tool instead.

returns.description: Response containing: - note_id: ID of the created note - success: Whether the note was created successfully
